image.name: city.png
image.alt: A futuristic low-angle cityscape in orange, purple, and light blue

image.name: boom.png
image.alt: A desert landscape littered with metal debris, the sky full of falling debris burning on atmospheric entry. A cloaked figure stands in the foreground facing away

image.name: cat.png
image.alt: A picture featuring a sleeping cat, a teapot, and a laptop, all in a purple colour palette

image.name: station.png
image.alt: A landscape of a space station with a blue planet in the background

image.name: analysis.png
image.alt: A robotic hand holding a metal bug with wings made of clouds up to a floating robotic eye

image.name: bug.png
image.alt: A robotic bug on top of a flower

image.name: arm.png
image.alt: A robotic prosthetic arm stylised to look like stained glass

image.name: lava.png
image.alt: An ice cream sundae that looks like lava

image.name: sleep.png
image.alt: A stylised drawing of a person head down on a desk next to a candle while spirits surround them

image.name: circle.png
image.alt: A red glowing magic circle

image.name: vaporeon.png
image.alt: A drawing of the Pokemon Vaporeon, a half-fish half-fox

image.name: eggu.png
image.alt: An image of a broken egg emitting light. Inside is a skeletal bird. In front of it is a man holding a flask with red liquid inside

image.name: tide.png
image.alt: An image of a seaside, off the coast is a hole in the sea surrounded by coral

image.name: coils.png
image.alt: An image of a many-headed snake in a desert, the heads fighitng each other

image.name: twheel.png
image.alt: An image of a fractal circle, many parts made of glass with blood flowing through it

image.name: tflint.png
image.alt: An image of a stone at night surrounded by fires. The firelight and starlight above reflect off it

image.name: moa.png
image.alt: An image of a distant figure among the coils of a gargantuan serpent, larger than the whole frame, the figure showering in its blood

image.name: sun.png
image.alt: An image of a floating metal sphere with organic eyes on it

image.name: ani1.gif
image.alt: An animation: rain falls, and eventially becomes lines that form a Celtic knot pattern. Meanwhile, further knots grow out of the ground. The two twist together.

image.name: triskel.gif
image.alt: An animation: triskel forms out of three lines growing from the centre of the screen. The triskel glows blue, then its three lines unwind, each forming another triskel. These all glow, then each scatters into three lines and wind offscreen.

image.name: shattered.gif
image.alt: A gif of a blue translucent head with golden spikes sprouting from its back, seeming to have smashed their way out. It apears to glitch, like an old television
